address: Xã Minh Thắng, Thị xã Chơn Thành, Tỉnh Bình Phước
thought:
**Analysis of Address Transformation: "Xã Minh Thắng, Thị xã Chơn Thành, Tỉnh Bình Phước"**

Okay, so I've been tasked with finding the new administrative unit for "Xã Minh Thắng, Thị xã Chơn Thành, Tỉnh Bình Phước". First things first, I needed to figure out what happened to "Tỉnh Bình Phước". My understanding of the resolutions tells me that Bình Phước was merged into Đồng Nai, so the new province is definitely "Tỉnh Đồng Nai". That was pretty straightforward, thanks to resolution 60-NQ/TW.

Now, focusing on "Xã Minh Thắng," I dove into the details. I searched through the resolutions, specifically looking for any mentions of this particular commune within Đồng Nai. And bingo! Resolution 1662/NQ-UBTVQH15, line 38, directly addressed it. It clearly stated that "Xã Minh Thắng" was merged, along with a couple of others, to form a new commune named "Xã Nha Bích". That was exactly what I needed.

To solidify my findings, I then cross-referenced this with the "New wards" data.  There it was: "Xã Nha Bích" existing in "Tỉnh Đồng Nai", with its code, proving everything aligned.

I also considered the "Thị xã Chơn Thành" component,  since the old address included that.  But after carefully evaluating the resolution and thinking it through, I came to the conclusion that while Chơn Thành might have been involved in reorganization, the key to identifying the direct new place for "Xã Minh Thắng" was that specific line, which very clearly identified "Xã Nha Bích".

The request mentions "eliminating all districts," meaning that "Thị xã Chơn Thành" no longer exists as a district-level unit. The new ward directly maps to the province.

So, summing it up, my output, I'm confident in saying that the new administrative unit for "Xã Minh Thắng, Thị xã Chơn Thành, Tỉnh Bình Phước" is **"Xã Nha Bích" in "Tỉnh Đồng Nai."** The reference is Resolution 1662/NQ-UBTVQH15, line 38. That confirmation of an exact match, along with the other data, gives me a high level of confidence in this result.

citation.header: 1662/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Đồng Nai
citation.line: 38. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Minh Thắng, Minh Lập và Nha Bích thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Nha Bích.
